name: European Network for Education and Training - EUNET e.V.
membership:
Lifelong Learning Platform: http://lllplatform.eu/
Civil Society Europe: https://civilsocietyeurope.eu/
goal:
EUNET, the European Network for Education and Training e.V., is a network that brings together NGOs that inform and educate people of all ages about Europe or spread the European idea in any other way.
EUNET´s aims are to intensify the exchange of experiences, to improve the quality of our offers as well as to develop and distribute methodical-didactic material and simulations. Plus, we try to inform more people about our members´ activities.
EUNET offers further education for employees – full-time and honorary – of institutions focusing on European policy. We also represent the interests of organisations for information and education towards other regional, national or European institutions and sponsors.
EUNET unites, coordinates and pushes forward the several efforts of its members to encourage European integration and to especially involve Europe´s citizens into and inform them about this process.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Youth
